passive_1: Enemy champions within 700 units of you become cursed, causing them to receive 12% increased magic damage from all sources.
Enemy champions within 700 units of you become cursed, reducing their magic resistance by 30%.
Enemy champions within 700 units of you become cursed, reducing their magic resistance by 30%. Gain 10 bonus magic resistance per cursed enemy.
Enemy champions within 600 units of you become cursed, reducing their magic resistance by 20%. Gain 10 bonus magic resistance per cursed enemy.

passive_2: Restore mana equal to 7% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions, and health equal to 25% of mana spent, up to 20 health per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.
Restore mana equal to 8% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions, and health equal to 20% of mana spent, up to 15 health per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 15 per second.

passive_1: Enemy champions within 550 units of you become cursed, reducing their magic resistance by 5 (+ 1.2% bonus health), capped at a reduction of 25 magic resistance. Gain 9 bonus magic resistance per cursed enemy. Champions can only be afflicted by one curse at a time, prioritizing the most potent curse.

Enemy champions within 550 units of you become cursed, reducing their magic resistance by 5 (+ 1.2% bonus health), capped at a reduction of 25 magic resistance. Gain 7 bonus magic resistance per cursed enemy. Champions can only be afflicted by one curse at a time, prioritizing the most potent curse.

Enemy champions within 550 units of you become cursed, reducing their magic resistance by 5 (+ 1% bonus health), capped at a reduction of 20 magic resistance. Gain 7 bonus magic resistance per cursed enemy. Champions can only be afflicted by one curse at a time, prioritizing the most potent curse.
Immobilizing an enemy champion increases the damage they take by 15% for 5 seconds.
Immobilizing an enemy champion increases the damage they take by 10% for 4 seconds.

motd: Change: Aura range type changed to edge to center from center to center (functionally scales with champion size).

passive_1: Nearby enemy champions take 15% more magic damage (325 range)
motd: Bugfix: No longer counts as a spell for the purposes of Electrocute's or Phase Rush's 3 unique spell requirement.

passive_2: 15% of damage taken from champions is gained as mana. Spending mana restores 20% of mana spent as health, up to 25 per cast (toggle spells heal for up to 25 per second).

passive_1: Nearby enemy champions take 10% more magic damage (500 range)
